analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xb912d5f5da6758c6da3587811b0ecb87297918a4.sol:
	Contract ContractApertureTvCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xb912d5f5da6758c6da3587811b0ecb87297918a4.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xb912d5f5da6758c6da3587811b0ecb87297918a4.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
